column4: looking at the /usr/src/linux-headers-2.6.10-5/.config for 5.04 it appears CONFIG_NET_RADIO was not set in the built kernel, am I interpreting this correctly?
: If it's in .config, yep prolly nod
actually it says # CONFIG_NET_RADIO is not set, but if that's true surely no wifi would work in 5.04?
